Articles.Content: So I noticed in Robbaz's most recent KSP video he airdropped a tank with a modified A300, and after making my own Replica of said tank (is a bit different but pretty close) and modification to the A300, I noticed that with the modifications I made not only did the A300 handle the load with ease but also lost barely any maneuverability with the extra load. It seems that the A300 is capable of carrying some very large cargoes. Has anyone else tried something similar to this (using the A300 or a modified version to transport stuff like tanks or base modules)?
It can carry my WIP shuttle high enough even with all that drag, A300 is a beast
